name: DMT GmbH & Co KG
goal:
DMT Group aims to deliver international best-practice technological solutions for our customers in the engineering, energy and mining industry worldwide. DMT Group values long-term relationships with our clients based on integrity, honesty and professionalism, to foster constant development of our employees and lead by example to create a safe environment for man and machine.

DMT Group maintains 17 offices worldwide and operates on a global scale. DMT has completed several thousand projects in over 150 countries, working in over 25 countries in a typical year.

DMT Group provides a range of independent services in the 4 main fields of Engineering, Consulting, Exploration, and Geotechnics. It also develops technology products and offers solutions for industrial metrology and testing with emphasis on infrastructure, natural resources, and safety.

DMT Group is an active member of numerous professional associations, committees and societies around the world and benefits from more than 20 inhouse accredited testing laboratories and expert bodies with about 100 officially recognised experts.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
